application_type_full: Prior Approval: Change of use - offices to dwellinghouses
description: Change of use of part second and part third floor; fourth floor; part fifth floor; and part sixth to eighth floor from Class B1(a) office to Class C3 dwellinghouses to form 57 units (29 one bedroom and 28 two bedroom units) (56 day application for prior approval in respect of transport and highways, contamination, flooding and noise impacts under Class O Part 3 of the GPDO)
decision_conditions: Car Parking Details to be Implemented
